name: Lokseva Shikshan Vikas Trust
briefDescription: •	The Organization has been working on different issues like high mortality in women and children, water born diseases, Child Labor,  high drop-out ratio in students, poverty  with the support of Government, other NGOs and local community. The main activities of the organization are as under•	40  Bed multi specialist General Hospital in Danta. (Support of RSBY scheme – Center Government)•	(Childline 1098) help line center in Banaskantha for child care and Protection. (support Ministry of women and child development)•	11 Hand pump Installation in Rajasthan Barmer District.•	8 RO Plant Installations in Banaskantha.•	Provides regular and timely vaccination to pregnant women and 0 to 5 years children.•	Arranges basic health check up and awareness camps.•	Provides nutrition food to very anemic women and children.•	Provides essential school materials to very poor students.•	Arranges educational awareness camps.•	Arranges vocational trainings.
